data.title: ESPERA-WERKE GMBH
data.meta_description:
ESPERA-WERKE GMBH | 2,532 followers on LinkedIn. One step ahead.
Automatic weighing, labeling and inspection technology for fresh food industry. | ESPERA is a leading manufacturer of solutions for weighing, labelling and inspection technologies. It´s field of application is in the industry sector, with the major focus in food idnsutry. The product portfolio includes manual and automatic weigh-price labelling machines, checkweighing solutions, inespection solutions and full machine software integrations.
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.

ESPERA is a leading manufacturer of solutions for weighing, labelling and inspection technologies. It´s field of application is in the industry sector, with the major focus in food idnsutry. The product portfolio includes manual and automatic weigh-price labelling machines, checkweighing solutions, inespection solutions and full machine software integrations. Since more than 90 yeras ESPERA is setting trends in the field of weighing, labeling and inspection with a market leading position. The headquater is located in Duisburg/ Germany and since 3 generations the family owned company is globally present with it´s subsidiaries and distribution partners.

Website

http://www.espera.com
